short_description: davyhurst is a mining & gas exploration company based in shire of menzies, australia.
long_description: the davyhurst gold mine is a gold mine located 53 km south-west of menzies, near davyhurst. the mine was formerly been owned by monarch gold mining company ltd, and went on care and maintenance shortly before monarch went into administration in june 2008. the mine resumed operation in early 2021, now owned by ora banda mining, a successor of monarch gold.
business_tags: environmental sustainability | processing plant | mining company
